title: Super galaxy fizz ultimate not working
body: Im not sure if i just got really bad at skill shots, but ever since i got the super galaxy fizz skin, his ultimate sometimes glitches and doesn't attach to the enemy champion. I've had the fish completely pass through the enemy champion or not stick at all. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hiya crystalseth415 -

Thanks for the report! 

I've gone ahead and loading into game with SG Fizz, and I'm not able to repro this. The hitbox is the same as the other skins/base. If you have a video of this, or any additional info, please feel free to post it! ^-^
Never saw a problem with his ult on the PBE, do you have a video of this?
unfortunately i dont think i'll be able to get a video of this, but i think i'll try playing a few more games before i attempt to
